title: Xara Designer Pro X9 v9.2.7 Build 30974 (x86) Incl Activator [To
description:
Xara Designer Pro X9

Powerful graphical tool for creating professional web-graphics using both vector and bitmap images. Create stunning graphic compositions using a rich palette of special effects, including transparency of management tools, pressure-sensitive brush tools to create fills and transforming objects. Tools to automatically generate contours and soft shadows, extrusion and smoothing the edges allow you to work much more productive, and the unprecedented speed of opening files and redraw the screen to save time. 

Program features:

- The most accurate, efficient vector rendering engine 
- Create effects such as shadows, transparency, etc. interactive, fast and intuitive way 
- Support Drag and Drop 
- Unlimited levels of undo and redo 
- Increase the image up to 25000% with a tool to increase 
- Smoothing of vectors to achieve maximum quality 
- Fast, smooth and high-quality vector 3D extrude tool 
- A set of built-in editing tools of the vectors and figures 
- Several built-in powerful tools for adding realistic effects with just one click 
- Unique indestructible editing photos without any loss of quality 
- Create panoramic images 
- Support for Adobe Photoshop plug-ins 
- Built-in "Site" allows you to create multi-page websites 
- Create a really efficient Flash animations 
- Create a site in the program supports all browsers and Web standards 
- Support for a large number of graphic formats (GIF, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF, PSD, RAW, EPS, AI, PDF, WMF, etc.) 
- Full support for import and export PSD files 
- Support for XPS export (and has a beta version of the filter to import XPS) 

System Requirements:

Windows XP / Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8 

Homepage: http://www.xara.com/ 

Installation Instructions: 

- Install program.
- Use Activator to register application. (Read Tracer.nfo given in Activator folder for further detail)
- Done, Enjoy.

Have A Nice Day
